code: import React from'react';import APIService from'./APIService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ArticleList(_ref){let{articles,editArticle,deleteArticle,onArticleClick}=_ref;const handleEditArticle=article=>{editArticle(article);};const handleDeleteArticle=article=>{APIService.DeleteArticle(article.id).then(()=>deleteArticle(article)).catch(error=>console.log(error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:articles&&articles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",onClick:()=>onArticleClick(article),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:article.body}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();handleEditArticle(article);},children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();handleDeleteArticle(article);},children:"Delete"})]})},article.id))});}export default ArticleList;
